pages.text: A stick with sugaron it.$(br2)...wait wait wait, there's more to it!$(br)If you place this stick so that its underside is immersed in $(l:magical_items/liquid_crystal)Liquid Crystal$(/l), you just have to slowly dissolve more sugar in the liquid until the stick turns into a sweet-crunchy candy stick.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: $(italic)You might even have more options than just plain Sugar? Liquid crystal and all that...

pages.title: Rock Candy Decoration
pages.text: You can harvest grown Sugar Sticks with $(thing)Silk Touch$() to make them keep their grown size.$(br2)You can then use those grown sticks as fancy lights, or just for storage. The bigger they have grown they more light they give up.

pages.title: Gemstone Rock Candy
pages.text: A little $(l:general/gemstone_powder)Gemstone Powder$(/l) in addition to the Sugar dissolved in the liquid allows the Rock Candy to take on the gemstone typical color.$(br2)You always wanted to know what gemstones taste like. This one seems like a healthier option than snorting it up your nose.
